Diagnostics & Visualization
of boreholes

WEDIVIZ – innovative analytics platform for integration, visualization and use of structured and unstructured data to reduce operating cost and increase production uptime.

Companies
Focused on reduction of well failures, increase in production uptime, and operating efficiency, WEDIVIZ platform revolutionized the way industry deal with production and operation data.

WEDIVIZ

Built-in analytics capabilities provide options to integrate various internal and external data sources, parse reports, transform and structure data. Dynamic filtering, data visualization, and clustering functionality enhance Customer’s understanding of the data types, quality, and relationships.

Multivariate analysis of downhole failures and downtime events can be improved with machine learning workflow, developed specifically for oilfield operations and productions activities. Customized reports and output summaries facilitate collaboration, reduce meetings time and improve decisions quality.

For Oilfield Service Companies
Data must be prepared for analysis by removing bad values, dealing with missing values, aligning data from different systems and performing any required transformations.

Automation can play a significant role in completing those tasks and others in the analysis workflows by supplementing the skills of users with best practice-based approaches to data conditioning. This is an area that receives little attention in the plans of many companies. Our team will get yours up and running fast. We accelerate implementation by using.
